评论概述: The collar adds excitement to the shirt
评论详情: I love soft fabric that this shirt is made of. It didn't shrink and the fabric still feels great.  I got the x large size and it fits a 42 bust fine.  The hem of the shirt is long so it covers any tummy bulges.
Got a compliment from the first person who saw me wearing this. I would rate it a 5 but the neckline is a little itchy.
I’m wear this to work and always get compliments

This cute summer shirt arrived vacuum-packed in a ziplock bag. It seems very well made and the material is 60% polyester, 35% rayon, and 5% spandex so it is comfortable and stretchy. I only buy V-neck shirts and when I saw this one I thought it would be perfect, and it is. The lacy neck is a nice addition to a classic T which classes it up a lot. It is machine washable and I would tumble dry on Low to Medium.

- I bought colorful leave top. - It has beautiful neck design. - It fits nicely so true to size. - I haven't washed yet so. - It can be worn for work or casual.

Comfortable and soft

评论概述: Soft and stretchy short-sleeve top for casual days
评论详情: I’ve been picking up a few new short-sleeve tops to freshen up my spring wardrobe. I ordered this one in Medium (my normal size), and the size is perfect. The material is a soft rayon/polyester/spandex blend and stretchy - which is precisely what I prefer over a form-fitting shirt.  The v-neckline is trimmed with a 1-1/2” lacy/embroider piece. The sleeves and hemline have a simple turn-stitch edge.  I like the fact that the top is on the longer side so I can wear it with capris or leggings.  This top also looks great with jeans, shorts, or dressier slacks. And it’s an ideal choice for casual days.

I ordered one and had to order another two.  They are very soft and romy, i normally wear a medium and i ordered a small and the fit is perfect.  It is a very relaxed fit but not sloppy or slouchy and you can dress if up or down.  I work in an office and will be wearing these in the summer.  The material is not too thick and not flimsy it's the perfect top a must get :)

What I like most about this shirt is the neckline, followed by the lovely pink I chose. It is versitile and in one of my favorite styles. It can pair equally well with jeans as it would with office attire. The material is soft like others have said in their reviews, but it is 100% synthetic, and I have to admit that I prefer cotton or at least a cotton blend. The fit was okay. I tend to wear an XL, and although I followed the Amazon sizing suggestion for size XL, this shirt is slightly snug for my preference. The length seems good. Not really tunic length, but long enough to wear with jeans or dress pants whether tucked or loose. Overall, this is a stylish and attractive shirt that makes a great addition to my wardrobe.  I would like to get a couple more of these since they are a good value and versatile, but I would probably buy the next size up to achieve the fit I prefer.

I ordered this for my wife. It is a nice t-shirt material with a woven neckline that dresses it up a bit.  She can wear this alone with jeans or shorts, or she can layer it with a cardigan and wear it to the office with dress pants or a skirt.  The fit is true to size, but the overall length is a bit long.  This is perfect if you leave it untucked, as it will cover the behind, but if you like to tuck your shirts in, it tends to bunch up.  My wife is 5'4" wearing a Medium size, so your results could vary with that.  Very comfortable to wear, and she has gotten many compliments on it the first day she wore it to the office.
This shirt is made of very comfortable material and is so cute with jeans. The detail on the neckline is cool and takes this shirt up a notch from the normal. Love the elevated casual look.

评论概述: Comfortable.  Moves With You.  Nice Color.  Cute Neckline.
评论详情: The Women’s Dressy Casual Lacey V Neck (ASIN: B0CPY5J6BC) is a nice, soft top.  I particularly like the V neck with the lace border.  The material is comfortable and has a nice stretch that moves with you.  It fits as expected and I like the length, so I can wear it tucked or loose.
This shirt is so soft!!  I love the quality. It is true to size and looks great on! It will be a summer favorite.

I'm always hesitant to order a V neck shirt without trying it on. I don't like the neck to plunge too far. This top does not, it's perfect.  The fabric is soft and comfortable. The lace splice v neck isn't itchy (a good thing). The fit is as it should be, and the length is too.  Not tunic long, but well covering the trouser top. The color is lovely and doesn't show up well in my pictures. Well made, looks great, so comfortable.  What more could I want?
I absolutely love this shirt it can be dressy or casual

Love this tshirt with a twist! Comfy, soft fabric and no issues with the cross cross portion being turned the wrong way. Would recommend and purchase again

I really like tops with cutouts or geometric designs on them so when I saw this shirt, I had to have it.  This shirt, the Dimur Women's Tops Dressy Casual V Neck Criss Cross T Shirts in black in a medium, fits as advertised, loose, but not baggy and has a nice length to it.  I have a bit of a mommy belly and this shirt hides it pretty well.  I like that the detailing is attached at both ends so the straps lay flat and don't easily twist.  The only drawback to this type of shirt, is if you spend a lot of time in the sun, you will have an interesting tan line.  After several washes, it retains its shape and its color nicely.  The material feels nice and doesn't pill. For under $20 you can't ask for a better shirt.  Definitely a good choice.
This tshirt has nice neck detail which elevates it above a basic tee.  I ordered up because I wanted to wear it with leggings but I didn't really need to.

I have worn and washed this shirt several times now. It's very comfortable so I wear it often. It seems to run a little big, so unless you like your shirts lose, you may want to size down one size. The color is heathered green, I like it and the straps on the neckline are a nice detail. It has held up through several washes, with no signs of fading or wear and tear. Good shirt!
Very comfortable and fits loosely but size is right. Comfortable material. Looks great on.
